squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx

Class SquidApplicationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
      • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.SquidApplicationAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class SquidApplicationAdapter
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
    A partial application adapter that uses the Zodiac-Square fonts. It should be completed as follows: the ApplicationAdapter.create() method should assign screen. Then, you should implement AbstractSquidScreen.getNext(); and you'll be done.
    Author:
    smelC
